description: &2Desert Temples&r contain a &3TNT&r-&3Pressure Plate&r pit trap with &dloot chests&r inside.
A pattern adorns the centre of the centre of the temple, concealing the pit. By &dbreaking the centre blocks without standing on them&r, the pit can be revealed.
The explosive pressure plate is visible in the centre of the pit. After &dmining downwards to reach the bottom&r, the pressure plate can be broken to defuse the trap.
The &3Chests&r and &3TNT&r can then both be taken.
